mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTITEM (USERNAME, ITEMID, QUANTITY) VALUES( #{username}, #{itemId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME, ITEMID, QUANTITY FROM CARTITEM WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND ITEMID = #{itemId}

SELECT CARTITEM.ITEMID, CARTITEM.QUANTITY, ITEM.ATTR1, PRODUCT.NAME AS productName, PRODUCT.PRODUCTID, ITEM.LISTPRICE, ITEM.LISTPRICE*CARTITEM.QUANTITY AS total FROM CARTITEM,ITEM,PRODUCT WHERE CARTITEM.USERNAME = #{username} AND CARTITEM.ITEMID = ITEM.ITEMID AND ITEM.PRODUCTID = PRODUCT.PRODUCTID
